hero.title: Cultivating Connections, Harvesting Prosperity with {appName}
hero.subtitle: The essential digital ecosystem connecting every stakeholder in the agricultural value chain. From seed to sale, DamDoh fosters growth, transparency, and collaboration.

features.title: Key Features of DamDoh
features.subtitle: An integrated platform designed to meet the diverse needs of the agricultural community.

networking.title: Smart Networking
networking.description: AI-powered connection suggestions based on your role, location, and needs. Find the right partners, from suppliers to buyers.

marketplace.title: Digital Marketplace
marketplace.description: A direct channel to buy and sell produce, inputs, and equipment. Expand your market and find the best prices.

forums.title: Thematic Forums
forums.description: Share knowledge and discuss specific topics like crop management, livestock health, and new technologies with your peers.

talent.title: Talent Exchange
talent.description: Offer or find agricultural services, from custom harvesting and drone surveying to professional consulting.

forWho.title: A Platform for Every Player
forWho.description: DamDoh is uniquely designed to serve the entire agricultural value chain, creating a single source of truth and opportunity for all.

farmers.title: Farmers
farmers.description: Access better markets, find quality inputs, and get expert advice to increase your yield and profitability.

buyers.title: Buyers & Processors
buyers.description: Source high-quality, traceable produce directly from growers and co-ops, ensuring supply chain reliability.

experts.title: Experts & Service Providers
experts.description: Offer your specialized skills and services to a wide agricultural audience seeking your expertise.

forWho.imageAlt: A diverse group of agricultural stakeholders collaborating

cta.title: Ready to Grow Your Network?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of farmers, buyers, and experts building a more connected and efficient agricultural future.

recoverPage.title: Account Recovery
recoverPage.description: Use your phone number or a friend's help to recover your account.
recoverPage.step1: Enter your phone number to start a recovery session.
recoverPage.step2: Show the temporary QR code to a trusted friend who also uses DamDoh.
recoverPage.step3: Once they confirm, you'll regain access to your account on this device.
recoverPage.scanDescription: Have a trusted DamDoh connection scan this temporary QR code from within their app.
recoverPage.scanNote: This code is temporary and for recovery purposes only.
